img_above_text:
# Cat Eye Beads
The Cat Eye Beads iare one of the Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Given its location in the game, it will likely be one of the first ones you find.
With the Cat Eye Beads equipped, you will get a slightly increased critical hit chance, which can provide a decent attack boost when you need it.

img_summary: The image depicts the Cat Eye Beads, a rare item in the game Black Myth: Wukong. This item is categorized under "Curios" in the game's equipment menu and is shown as equipped. The Cat Eye Beads slightly increase the player's critical hit chance, offering a modest attack boost. The beads are likely one of the first items players encounter in the game, enhancing their combat effectiveness early on. The document title and metadata confirm the item's name and its visual representation in the game interface.
